statements: SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT inverter_id, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT maintenance_details, inverter_id FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE inverter_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE inverter_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT inverter_id, COUNT(*) as maintenance_count FROM maintenance_schedule GROUP BY inverter_id;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE inverter_id = 10 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT inverter_id, maintenance_details FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01' AND maintenance_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY inverter_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT inverter_id FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_details LIKE '%major%' ORDER BY inverter_id;
SELECT inverter_id, COUNT(*) AS maintenance_count FROM maintenance_schedule GROUP BY inverter_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 3 ORDER BY maintenance_count DESC, inverter_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' AND maintenance_details IS NOT NULL ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC, inverter_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM InverterMaintenanceSchedule;
SELECT inverter_id, last_maintenance_date, maintenance_frequency FROM InverterMaintenanceSchedule;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE maintenance_type='Regular';
SELECT inverter_id, maintenance_date, technician_name FROM MaintenanceLogs ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT inverter_id, last_maintenance_date, next_maintenance_date FROM InverterMaintenanceSchedule WHERE last_maintenance_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM InverterMaintenanceSchedule;
SELECT inverter_id, last_maintenance_date, maintenance_frequency FROM InverterMaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_frequency > 6;
SELECT DISTINCT maintenance_type FROM MaintenanceLogs ORDER BY maintenance_type ASC;
SELECT inverter_id, COUNT(log_id) AS maintenance_count FROM MaintenanceLogs GROUP BY inverter_id HAVING maintenance_count > 3;

SELECT * FROM InverterMaintenanceSchedule INNER JOIN MaintenanceLogs ON InverterMaintenanceSchedule.inverter_id = MaintenanceLogs.inverter_id WHERE MaintenanceLogs.maintenance_type = 'Cleaning' ORDER BY MaintenanceLogs.maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inverters;
SELECT serial_number, manufacturer, installation_date FROM inverters;
SELECT id, serial_number, manufacturer, installation_date FROM inverters WHERE manufacturer='ABC Corp';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_description LIKE '%cleaning%';
SELECT inverter_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM maintenance_logs ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inverters;
SELECT manufacturer, serial_number FROM inverters WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT inverters.serial_number, maintenance_logs.maintenance_date, maintenance_logs.maintenance_description FROM inverters INNER JOIN maintenance_logs ON inverters.id = maintenance_logs.inverter_id WHERE maintenance_logs.inverter_id = 1;

SELECT technicians.name, technicians.email, maintenance_logs.maintenance_date FROM technicians INNER JOIN maintenance_logs ON technicians.technician_id = maintenance_logs.inverter_id WHERE maintenance_logs.inverter_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM inverter;
SELECT model, installation_date FROM inverter ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT serial_number, model, installation_date FROM inverter WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE scheduled_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT technician_id, name, contact_number FROM technician ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inverter ORDER BY serial_number DESC;
SELECT id, model FROM inverter WHERE installation_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT m.log_id, t.name, m.maintenance_date FROM maintenance_log m JOIN technician t ON m.technician_id = t.technician_id ORDER BY m.maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT s.schedule_id, i.serial_number, s.scheduled_date FROM maintenance_schedule s JOIN inverter i ON s.inverter_id = i.id ORDER BY s.scheduled_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM inverter WHERE serial_number LIKE '%ABC%' OR serial_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM tbl_inverters;
SELECT inverter_id, inverter_name FROM tbl_inverters WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT inverter_name, location, next_maintenance_date FROM tbl_inverters ORDER BY next_maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM tbl_maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT engineer_id, engineer_name, qualification FROM tbl_engineers WHERE qualification LIKE '%Certified%';
SELECT * FROM tbl_inverters;
SELECT inverter_id, inverter_name, location FROM tbl_inverters WHERE inverter_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM tbl_inverters WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT inverter_id, location, next_maintenance_date FROM tbl_inverters WHERE next_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT engineer_id, engineer_name, qualification FROM tbl_engineers ORDER BY engineer_name DESC;
